extDescription.message: Save and share your JIRA-Filters with a few clicks

FilterAlreadyExists.message: This filter already exists in your storage.

LookAtFilter.message: Take a look a your $FilterName$ filter.

ShareMailPublish.message: I share this Filter with JIRA FilterXport Chrome Extension: %0A %0A $FilterContent$

HowToUseDesc.message:
• open your favorite Jira filter.
  • enter the advanced filter view
  • select your filter query
  • select "Save filter" from the browser context menu
  • Done!
